plot outline: Shelly and Rajasree are students at fine arts college and they fall in love during college days. Their parents oppose for their marriage and they elope and end up with Dr. Alex. Rajasree asks Shelly to wait for the marriage, as she wants to do it with their parents permission. Dr. Alex gets an assignment for Shelly, to make a house boat for the tourism department. But he cannot complete the making of the boat and another architect, Andre enters into their life.
title: Mullavalliyum Thenmavum
plot: Shelly and Rajasree, who are sculptors, fall in love. While they wait for their parents' approval to get married, Shelly falls down from a sculpture while working and gets paralyzed.

Shelly and Rajasree are students at fine arts college and they fall in love during college days. Their parents oppose for their marriage and they elope and end up with Dr. Alex. Rajasree asks Shelly to wait for the marriage, as she wants to do it with their parents permission. Dr. Alex gets an assignment for Shelly, to make a house boat for the tourism department. But he cannot complete the making of the boat and another architect, Andre enters into their life.::tojo
